sentences.en: A new centre for research on toxic waste was inaugurated today at Imperial College.
sentences.cn: 新建的有毒废物研究中心今天在皇家学院举行落成典礼。

sentences.en: Britain’s imperial expansion in the 19th century
He repaired to the Imperial Palace.
He was certainly much more imperious - she ended by calling it imperial.
sentences.cn: 他肯定更加盛气凌人,不,更加气宇轩昂.

sentences.en: How many imperial inches are there in one metric centimetre? — Naught point three nine three seven inches.
sentences.cn: 一厘米等于多少英寸? ——等于0.397英寸.

sentences.en: In 1959, Akihito broke with imperial tradition by marrying a commoner.
sentences.cn: 明仁天皇在1959年打破皇室传统，娶了一位平民女子为妻。

sentences.en: Mr. Harling, therefore, seemed to me autocratic and imperial in his ways.
sentences.cn: 因此, 在我看来,哈林先生那一套有点专制和唯我独尊的味道.

sentences.en: The boffins of Imperial College in London think they may have found a solution.
sentences.cn: 伦敦帝国理工学院的科研人员认为他们可能已经找到了解决办法。

sentences.en: The imperial gallon is not the same size as the US one.
sentences.cn: 英制的加仑与美制的容量不同.

sentences.en: The Imperial Guards presented homage to the king.
sentences.cn: 皇家警卫队向国王宣誓效忠.

sentences.en: The satisfaction she took in herself was positively plural - imperial.
sentences.cn: 她从自我欣赏中得到的乐趣是多方面的,至高无上的.

sentences.en: The waters undermined the great wall round the Imperial Hunting Park.
sentences.cn: 洪水侵蚀了禁园的墙基.

sentences.en: There were many henchmen -- runners from an almost imperial throne - to do his bidding.
sentences.cn: 他有许多来信 —— 几乎象钦差 —— 遵照着他的命令办事.

sentences.en: TheThey executed Russia's imperial family in 1918.
sentences.cn: 他们1918年处死了俄国沙皇皇族。

sentences.en: They executed Russia's imperial family in 1918.
sentences.cn: 他们1918年处死了俄国沙皇皇族。

sentences.en: They made an objection to the imperial system with resolution.

words.tran_cn: 帝国主义的；帝国主义者的；拥护帝国主义的
帝王般地；威严地；帝国地

phrases.tran_cn: 国子监（建于1873年）；帝国学院

trans.tran_cn: 帝国的，皇帝的，（度量衡）英制的
trans.tran_en: relating to an empire or to the person who rules it
